TEXT.TITLE: TWO RESIGN FROM SCOTT INSTRUMENTS <SCTI> BOARD
TEXT.BODY: Scott Instruments Inc said two members of its board resigned. The company did not give a reason for the departure of the directors, David M. Jacobs and Frederick Brodsky. Scott said it does not plan to fill the vacancies left by their resignations. Reuter
